meanings.sent1: The hikers were pinnacling the mountain, reaching the very top.
meanings.sent2: The excitement was pinnacling as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The race to the finish line was pinnacling with suspense.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were pinnacling like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The music built up, pinnacling in a crescendo of sound.

meanings.definition: To form or be at the highest point.
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper was pinnacling above the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The sun was pinnacling in the sky at noon.
meanings.sent3: The tower was pinnacling so high, it seemed to touch the clouds.
meanings.sent4: His career was pinnacling, reaching new heights of success.
meanings.sent5: The tree was pinnacling over the rest, standing tall and proud.
